title: ðŸ•‘Time Preference
desc: What does "lower your time preference" mean and how does that relate to Bitcoin?

msgs.text: What does "lower your time preference" mean and how does that relate to Bitcoin?

Lowering your time preference when it comes to money is all about saving for the future. When you invest in bitcoin, you are thinking about your future. When you don't spend money mindlessly on things you really don't need, and instead, stack sats, you are lowering your time preference.
Every one of us is governed by the same incentive...to gain more time to do stuff.
